speaker.whotheyare: Christina Costa teaches psychology to undergraduate and high school students and studies well-being and resilience.
speaker.whylisten: Christina Costa is most passionate about inclusive learning in higher education. In 2020, she was diagnosed with a brain tumor in the right hemisphere of her brain. As a neurodivergent educator, she hopes to inspire others to celebrate neurodiversity and give hope to other brain cancer and brain tumor patients. She loves hippos, is Beyoncé's number one fan and would do anything for her students.
